biography.content:
Professor David Thompson is Professor of Nursing and Director of the Centre for the Heart and Mind at ACU. He is also Adjunct Professor at Monash University, The University of Queensland and The Chinese University of Hong Kong. Additionally, David is a Professorial Fellow at the University of Melbourne.

His major research interests are the development and validation of cardiovascular patient-reported outcome measures and the design and evaluation of novel brief psychosocial interventions for patients and partners.

Previously, David filled the roles of Professor of Cardiovascular Nursing, University of Leicester (2007-2010), Professor of Nursing, The Chinese University of Hong Kong (2002-2007), Professor of Nursing, University of York (1998-2002), Professor of Nursing, University of Hull (1994-1998) and Professor of Nursing Research, UK Department of Health (1998-2001).

Accolades and awards:

Fellow of the Cardiac Society of Australia and New Zealand (2013)
Fellow of the American Academy of Nursing (2008)
Fellow of the European Society of Cardiology (1998)
Fellow of the Florence Nightingale Foundation (1997)
Fellow of the Royal College of Nursing (1992)
Appointments and affiliations:

Professorial Fellow, Department of Psychiatry, University of Melbourne (2014-present)
Adjunct Professor, Department of Epidemiology and Preventive Medicine, Monash University (2012-present)
Honorary Professor, School of Nursing & Midwifery, The University of Queensland (2005-present)
Editorial roles:

Editor, European Journal of Cardiovascular Nursing (2001-present)
Editorial Board Member, Heart & Lung (2011-present)
Editorial Board Member, Heart (2009-present)
Editorial Board Member, Nursing Research and Practice (2009-present) 
Editorial Board Member, British Journal of Cardiac Nursing (2005-present)
Editorial Board Member, BMC Nursing (2003-present)
Editorial Board Member, Intensive and Critical Care Nursing (1997-present)
Committee membership:

Secondary Prevention Alliance Council (2014)
Cardiac Society of Australia and New Zealand Cardiovascular Nurses Council Executive (2014)
World Heart Foundation/World Congress of Cardiology Scientific Program Committee (2013-2014)
National Health & Medical Research Council Research Translation Faculty Cardiovascular Health & Stroke Steering Group (2013-present)
Victorian Cardiac Clinical Network Cardiac Rehabilitation Sub-Committee (2012-present)
National Heart Foundation of Australia Cardiac Rehabilitation Forum (2012-present)
